text: Lekeni mng'amalitsa kudununzika kwa chipindi chidodo, Imulungu yane uluso wose, iyawakemile mwingile mne utunitso wake wa ghamatsuwa ghose mne ukwilunga na Kiristu, yeye imwenyegho katsomtendani muwe waghima keli, katsomwing'ani ingupfu, katsowatenda mwime ghoya na kumwing'eni ghumsingi ighunoghile.
